home.bio: A Software Engineer focusing on Frontend development with over 2 years of experience. I have expertise in modern JavaScript ecosystems such as React, Next.js, and TypeScript for building responsive and high-performance web applications. With attention to detail and a deep understanding of user experience, I am committed to delivering digital solutions that are not only functional but also intuitive and enjoyable to use.
home.tech_stack_desc: Technologies I use to build modern and scalable applications
home.work_desc: I help brands, companies, institutions, and startups create exceptional digital experiences for their businesses through strategic development services.
home.work_cta: I'm open to freelance projects, please contact me via email to see how we can collaborate.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: A glimpse of who I am â€“ because every detail adds depth to the canvas of life.

intro.greeting: Hello! Thank you for visiting my personal website.
intro.bio1: I am a Software Engineer focusing on Frontend development with over 2 years of experience. I have expertise in modern JavaScript ecosystems such as React, Next.js, and TypeScript for building responsive and high-performance web applications. With attention to detail and a deep understanding of user experience, I am committed to delivering digital solutions that are not only functional but also intuitive and enjoyable to use.
intro.bio2: My journey in web development began from my interest in technology and design. I've always believed that technology should make life easier, not the other way around. This principle is what I always apply in every project I work on. I enjoy exploring new technologies and always strive to stay up-to-date with the latest developments in web development.
intro.bio3: In every project, I focus not only on code but also on business aspects and user experience. I believe that a good application is one that can solve real problems in an elegant and efficient way. I always try to understand user and business needs deeply before starting to develop solutions.
intro.bio4: Outside of coding, I am very interested in UI/UX design and software architecture. I believe that a good understanding of design and architecture is key to building applications that not only work well but are also easy to maintain and develop in the future. I also actively contribute to the open source community and enjoy sharing knowledge with fellow developers.
intro.bio5: I am always open to collaboration and new opportunities. If you have an interesting project or want to discuss technology, don't hesitate to contact me. Let's create something amazing together!
